purpose: Architecture-level trade-off: transport (CRN GKSL) vs recurrent-memory confinement (thermal barriers)

memory_module.model: continuous-time Markov transport proxy on SBM (3 assemblies)

transport_module.metric: Liouvillian gap g(kappa) as proxy for relaxation/transport efficiency

limitations: Memory module is linear transport proxy (no nonlinear attractor stabilization or inhibition dynamics).
Transport and memory 'noise knobs' are treated as a common axis for the global-vs-modular illustration; in reality, kappa and T_env are different physical controls.
Fitness function is illustrative (weighted sum), not a calibrated evolutionary model.
